trans-unit.source: Represents a custom action that appears in the **Custom Actions** group on the Ribbon of an Outlook item.
trans-unit.target: 表示 Outlook 项的功能区的“自定义操作”组中显示的自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: Actions display buttons that enable users to respond to a Microsoft Office Outlook item.
trans-unit.target: 操作显示使用户能够对 Microsoft Office Outlook 项做出响应的按钮。

trans-unit.source: You can create a custom action that opens any kind of Outlook item.
trans-unit.target: 你可以创建自定义操作打开任何种类的 Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: These actions appear in the **Custom Actions** group on the Ribbon of an Outlook item.
trans-unit.target: 这些操作出现在**自定义操作**组在功能区中的 Outlook 项。

trans-unit.source: For more information about custom actions, see [Custom Actions in Outlook Form Regions](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-actions-in-outlook-form-regions.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关自定义操作的详细信息，请参阅[Outlook 窗体区域中的自定义操作](/visualstudio/vsto/custom-actions-in-outlook-form-regions.md)。

trans-unit.source: Usage
trans-unit.target: 用法

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how to address the form that appears when the user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定如何对在用户执行自定义操作时显示的窗体进行寻址。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike" /> values that specify how to address the target form that appears when the user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike" /> 值之一，该值指定如何对在用户执行自定义操作时显示的目标窗体进行寻址。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike.Reply" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike.Reply" />。

trans-unit.source: The target form can forward the original message and its attachments, reply to the original sender, reply to all recipients of the original message, or reply by posting to the messages folder.
trans-unit.target: 目标窗体可以转发原始消息和其附件，原始的发件人，回复的原始消息中，所有收件人答复或答复到邮件文件夹的发布。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.AddressLike%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike.Response> if you want the button that opens the target form to appear when the user clicks the **Vote** button in the **Respond** group of the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.AddressLike%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike.Response>如果你想打开目标窗体以显示当用户单击按钮**投票**按钮**响应**组功能区。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the Message or Notes field of an Outlook item is included in the reply that appears when the user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定如何将 Outlook 项的“邮件”或“备注”字段包含在用户执行自定义操作时出现的答复中。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionBody" /> values that specify how the Message or Notes field of an Outlook item is appended to the form that appears when the user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionBody" /> 值之一，该值指定如何将 Outlook 项的“邮件”或“备注”字段追加到在用户执行自定义操作时出现的窗体中。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionBody.User" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionBody.User" />。

trans-unit.source: The form can include the original item as an attachment, or include the original item as text that appears in the body of the item.
trans-unit.target: 窗体可以包括作为附件，原始的项目，或以文本形式显示该项的正文中包含的原始项。

trans-unit.source: You can also omit any references to the original item.
trans-unit.target: 你可以忽略与原始项目的任何引用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionBody> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参见 <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionBody> 枚举。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> is enabled for the form region.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为窗体区域启用了 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.Enabled%2A> to `false`, the custom action will not appear in the **Custom Actions** group of the Ribbon when you open the item that displays the form region in Outlook.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.Enabled%2A>到`false`，自定义操作不会出现在**自定义操作**组功能区，当你打开窗体区域显示在 Outlook 中的项。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how to respond when the user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当用户执行自定义操作时如何响应。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionMethod" /> values that specify how to respond when the user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionMethod" /> 值之一，该值指定当用户执行自定义操作时如何响应。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionMethod.Open" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionMethod.Open" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify whether you want to open a new form, send the form immediately, or prompt the user to open or send the new form.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于指定是否想要打开新的窗体、 立即发送窗体或提示用户打开或发送新的窗体。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置自定义操作的名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name of the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示自定义操作的名称。

trans-unit.source: The name does not have to be unique.
trans-unit.target: 名称不必是唯一的。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction> can share the same name as a <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction> in the same <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction>可以共享相同的名称<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction>在同一个<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionCollection>。

trans-unit.source: The value is <see langword="null" />, or is empty.
trans-unit.target: 该值为 <see langword="null" /> 或空。

trans-unit.source: The value is greater than 256 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 该值的长度大于 256 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether to show the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> in the **Custom Actions** group of the Ribbon that displays the form region.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在显示表单区域的功能区的“自定义操作”组中显示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> appears on the Ribbon; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> 出现在功能区中，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.AddressLike%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike.Response> and the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.ShowOnRibbon%2A> property to `false`, then the custom action will not appear as an option when you click the **Vote** button in the **Respond** group of the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.AddressLike%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike.Response>和<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.ShowOnRibbon%2A>属性`false`，然后单击时，自定义操作将不显示为一个选项**投票**按钮**响应**组功能区。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that appears at the beginning of the subject line of the reply.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在答复的主题行开头显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents text that appears at the beginning of the subject line of the original form.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示在原始窗体的主题行开头显示的文本。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.TargetForm%2A> property to `IPM.Note`, a mail item appears when the user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.TargetForm%2A>属性`IPM.Note`，当用户执行自定义操作时，将出现一个邮件项。

trans-unit.source: The text that appears in the **Subject** field of the new mail item will begin with the string that you specify for the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.SubjectPrefix%2A> property followed by a colon (:).
trans-unit.target: 在显示的文本**主题**新邮件项的字段将以你为指定的字符串开头<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.SubjectPrefix%2A>属性后跟一个冒号 （:）。

trans-unit.source: The value is greater than 256 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 该值的长度大于 256 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the message class of the form that appears when the user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置当用户执行自定义操作时显示的窗体的邮件类。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the message class of the form that appears when a user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示当用户执行自定义操作时显示的窗体的邮件类。

trans-unit.source: Specify a message class to identify the type of form that you want to appear when the user executes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 指定消息类来标识你想要用户执行自定义操作时显示的窗体的类型。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want the custom action to open a mail item, set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.TargetForm%2A> property to `IPM.Note`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你想要打开邮件项的自定义操作，则设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.TargetForm%2A>属性`IPM.Note`。

trans-unit.source: The value is greater than 256 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 该值的长度大于 256 个字符。

trans-unit.source: The value of the string is empty or contains the name of a message class that is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 该字符串的值为空或包含无效的邮件类的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name that is used to identify the custom action in the **Custom Actions** group of the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称用于标识功能区的“自定义操作”组中的自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the name that is used to identify the custom action in the **Custom Actions** group of the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于标识中的自定义操作的名称的字符串**自定义操作**组功能区。

trans-unit.source: If you set the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.AddressLike%2A> property to <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike.Response>, the title appears as an option when you click the **Vote** button in the **Respond** group of the Ribbon.
trans-unit.target: 如果你设置<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.AddressLike%2A>属性<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomActionAddressLike.Response>，当你单击标题显示为选项**投票**按钮**响应**组功能区。

trans-unit.source: The value is greater than 256 characters in length.
trans-unit.target: 该值的长度大于 256 个字符。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> as XML.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个以 XML 形式表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> as XML.
trans-unit.target: 一个以 XML 形式表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.ToXml%2A> method if you want to create an XML manifest file that describes the custom action.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction.ToXml%2A>方法如果你想要创建 XML 清单文件描述的自定义操作。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that contains elements and attributes that describe the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回一个字符串，包含元素和属性，用于描述<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook.FormRegionCustomAction>。

trans-unit.source: You can call the `ToXML` method of other types in the <xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook> namespace to build a complete XML manifest file.
trans-unit.target: 你可以调用`ToXML`中其他类型的方法<xref:Microsoft.Office.Tools.Outlook>命名空间以生成完整的 XML 清单文件。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter" /> to which to write the string.
trans-unit.target: 要将字符串写入其中的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Saves the XML representation of the custom action in a string to an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串中包含的自定义操作的 XML 表示形式保存到 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlTextWriter" /> 对象。
